files.patch:
@@ -267,0 +267,6 @@
+    ifeq ($$($1_NATURE), HOTSPOT)
+      # HotSpot still needs these source directories even if indexing for only it is requested
+      $$(foreach src,$$(strip $$(patsubst $(TOPDIR)/%,%/include,$$(call FindModuleNativeDirs, java.base))),$$(call EmitNativeDir, $$(src)))
+      $$(call EmitNativeDir, src/java.base/share/native/libjimage)
+    endif
+
@@ -337,1 +343,1 @@
-    #                         <entry kind="macro" name="_WINDOWS" value=""/>
+    #                        <entry kind="macro" name="_WINDOWS" value=""/>
@@ -366,0 +372,6 @@
+  ifeq ($$($1_NATURE), HOTSPOT)
+    # HotSpot still needs these source directories even if indexing for only it is requested
+    $$(foreach src,$$(strip $$(patsubst $(TOPDIR)/%,%/include,$$(call FindModuleNativeDirs, java.base))),$$(call EmitLinkedDirectory, $$(src),$(TOPDIR)/$$(src)))
+    $$(call EmitLinkedDirectory, src/java.base/share/native/libjimage,$(TOPDIR)/src/java.base/share/native/libjimage)
+  endif
+
